School of Professional Studies Master's Degrees
School of Professional Studies Master's Degrees

This page details master's degree programs offered by the NYU School of Professional Studies, with links to individual programs where users can find information about admissions requirements, course listings and degree requirements, financing information, and general structural information about the program. Programs include an MS in Construction Management, MS in Event Management, MS in Global Affairs, MS in Global Security Conflict and Cyber Crime (STEM), MS in Global Sport, MS in Hospitality Industry Studies, MS in Human Capital Analytics and Technology (STEM), MS in Human Resource Management and Development, MS in Integrated Marketing, MS in Management and Systems (STEM), MS in Professional Writing, MS in Project Management (STEM), MS in Public Relations and Corporate Communication, MS in Publishing, MS in Real Estate, MS in Real Estate Development, MS in Sports Business, MS in Tourism Management, and MS in Translation.
